title: 114_s97
content: No Obamacare Kickbacks Act of 2015 Applies prohibitions against, and criminal penalties for, false statements and kickbacks in part A of title XI of the Social Security Act to plans and programs established or funded under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, including qualified health plans, catastrophic plans, health benefit exchanges, reinsurance programs, the risk corridor program, patient navigators, and contracts with individuals or entities to facilitate enrollment in exchanges. Directs the Inspector General of the Department of Health and Human Services and the Government Accountability Office to jointly study and report to Congress on the effect of this Act.
